## DurableContext.waitForCallback() method

Wait for an external system to complete a callback with the SendDurableExecutionCallbackSuccess or SendDurableExecutionCallbackFailure APIs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
waitForCallback<TOutput = string>(submitter: WaitForCallbackSubmitterFunc<TLogger>, config?: WaitForCallbackConfig<TOutput>): DurablePromise<TOutput>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

submitter

</td><td>

WaitForCallbackSubmitterFunc&lt;TLogger&gt;

</td><td>

Function that receives the callback ID and submits the callback

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

config

</td><td>

WaitForCallbackConfig&lt;TOutput&gt;

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional configuration for timeout and retry behavior

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[DurablePromise](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOutput&gt;

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->CallbackError<!-- -->} When callback fails, times out, or external system reports failure

## Example

```typescript
const result = await context.waitForCallback(async (callbackId, ctx) => {
  await submitToExternalAPI(callbackId);
});
```
